reviews.title: Escape from Reality
reviews.text: Stopped in The Gate House for a week in April for my fiancé's 50th Birthday. This is the second time we have stopped in Portmeirion (before we stopped 2 nights in Cliff House 2). Each time we have found all members of staff to be extremely efficient and helpful, in particular the staff on the entrance who always make you feel welcome, one of whom has been there for many years and it is always nice to see a familiar face.
